dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers powersellernyc.com Sony 1400
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Victor Tarver [mailto:vtarver@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 17, 2006 2:14 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers powersellernyc.com Sony
1400
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers powersellernyc.com Sony
1400


Dear Planet,

The only remaining URL that is infringing is
http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-18615--Sony-Sony-STR-DG1000-Receiv
er-.html, which is a copyrighted text violation.  Once the copyrighted
materials are removed I can issue you a case closed letter.  Please
confirm once this is done.  Thank you


Victor Tarver
LMS Representative
Net Enforcers Inc.
VTarver@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Monday, October 16, 2006 2:34 PM
To: Victor Tarver; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers powersellernyc.com Sony 1400

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------


From: Victor Tarver [mailto:vtarver@netenforcers.com] Posted At:
Tuesday, October 10, 2006 10:35 AM Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers powersellernyc.com/
SonyHA
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers powersellernyc.com/ SonyHA



Dear Planet,

Here are the infringing URLs for Sony Home Audio products:

http://powersellernyc.com/product-18485--Sony-DAV-X1V-.html

http://powersellernyc.com/product-18486--Sony-DAV-LF1H-.html



Both are text violations. Thank you for your cooperation in this matter.


Victor Tarver
LMS Representative
Net Enforcers Inc.
VTarver@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com
